title: Two Indian cricketers meet President Rajapaksa after receiving Ayurvedic treatments in Sri Lanka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Indian opening batsman Gautam Gambhir and left-arm fast bowler Ashish Nehra met with President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on Monday evening after receiving Ayurvedic treatments in Sri Lanka. Both players who are playing for Delhi Daredevils received treatments in Sri Lanka for the…
